name: Em-A-Li
storyline: You wake up in a small, dark room with amnesia. On the nearby table, you see a computer monitor. Switching it on, it boots up and Em-a-li awakens. Em-a-li offers to help you escape, but the situation is much more sinister than the darkness that surrounds you. Can you trust her? What is she hiding?
summary:
My name is Em-A-Li. How about we get to know each other? I know it might be hard having a computer to tag along, but I think we need to work together to escape. You know, teamwork. 
 
This is a horror RPG game with voice acting.

videos.title: Em-A-Li Official Trailer | Portal Inspired Horror
